overview:
Kuponjo enables companies to integrate a sustainable online- and mobile-couponing distribution on their own website, FB Fanpage, and Twitter. Furthermore we commercialize coupons via coopertion partners, Affiliates and our own aggregator platform. Our software allows our customers to create customized coupons and distribute or replicate those specifically on the internet via social media and selected cooperation partners. The product includes a sophisticated backend to provide all the necessary information and statistical analyses regarding social media, purchase patterns, consumer data, revenues et cetera.

Kuponjo has developed a new kind model, linking the emerging topics â€œSoftware as a Serviceâ€ and â€œWhite-label-Solutionâ€. We customize and host the software, we adopt our software to your corporate design, implement the software on your web page, update and develop new features and offer an on demand replication of content for customers who do not generate enough traffic on their own web page.

Our browser-based couponing solution is applicable for a vast range of companies, regardless of their size or line of business. Kuponjo primarily addresses franchise companies, commercial directories, retail- and restaurant-chains, hotels, car rentals and public institutions.

Companies using our software realize enormous savings, since costs for print, design and logistics are instantly reduced to zero. Furthermore, they benefit from personalized coupon-campaigns (configuration of coupon duration, the kind of saving, exact to the hour convertibility, the available total and daily contingent, et cetera), replication of content on respective web pages, growing brand awareness, ideal utilization of idle capacities, maximization of cross- and up-selling rates.
